sections.heading: Contamination; reports required
sections.text: Each state agency and political subdivision shall promptly report to the department any information which indicates that contamination is occurring.SourceLaws 1986, LB 894, ยง 2;Laws 1993, LB 3, ยง 15;R.S.1943, (1993), ยง 46-674.03;Laws 1996, LB 108, ยง 41;R.S.1943, (1998
